title.rendered: Igor Stimac appeals PM Modi to allow Indian football team to participate in Asian Games

content.rendered:
Igor Stimac, the head coach of India’s senior men’s football team, has pleaded with PM Narendra Modi and Sports Minister Anurag Thakur to let India compete in the Asian Games.

Read Also: Imagined myself playing for India so many times: Yashasvi on debut

According to Stimac, the Sports Ministry is refusing participation based on ranking. The truth is that our football squad is ranked higher than some of the other sports teams that have been given permission to compete, he said.

Read Also: Imagined myself playing for India so many times: Yashasvi on debut According to Stimac, the Sports Ministry is refusing participation based on ranking. […]
